body: I didn't want to get rid of `THTensor_getStoragePtr` because I don't want to return raw storage pointer in the "official" API, because after @cpuhrsch's patch merges I can return an `at::Storage` instead, and that's a lot safer.
body_html: I didn't want to get rid of THTensor_getStoragePtr because I don't want to return raw storage pointer in the "official" API, because after @cpuhrsch's patch merges I can return an at::Storage instead, and that's a lot safer.
body_text: I didn't want to get rid of THTensor_getStoragePtr because I don't want to return raw storage pointer in the "official" API, because after @cpuhrsch's patch merges I can return an at::Storage instead, and that's a lot safer.
